String.string: Use essential and optional consumables before combat.
You can buy these items from the <font color = '#FFFF00'>Training Dungeon Merchant</font> by the entrance to where each Boss is.
The dungeon has been cleared. Type <font color='#ffe761'>/reset</font> or use the <font color='#ffe761'>'Reset Instances' button in your Character Profile</font>.
Destroy the pylons to summon a Lancer or a Priest (not required for a 5-person party).
Defeat Akalath Travan with a summoned Lancer.
Defeat Akalath Kashir with a summoned Lancer.
You can find Divine Pylons on both sides of the entrance. Destroy the pylons from within 10m when needed.
Defeat Akalath Travan with a summoned Priest.
Defeat Akalath Kashir with a summoned Priest.
I'll hold this thing off! Give it your best shot!
I've activated Adrenaline Rush and Guardian Shout! Attack now!
